headline: Brown & Brown price target lowered to $130 from $138 at Truist
summary: Truist lowered the firm’s price target on Brown & Brown to $130 from $138 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares after its Q1 results. The firm is citing pressure on broker valuations in the wake of decelerating organic growth across the space this quarter, the analyst tells investors in a research note.
